property.name: hive.execution.engine
property.description: Expects one of [mr, tez]. Chooses execution engine. Options are: mr (Map reduce, default), tez. While MR remains the default engine for historical reasons, it is itself a historical engine and is deprecated in Hive 2 line. It may be removed without further warning.

property.name: hive.metastore.uris
property.description: Thrift URI for the remote metastore. Used by metastore client to connect to remote metastore.

property.name: datanucleus.schema.autoCreateAll
property.description: Auto creates necessary schema on a startup if one doesn't exist. Set this to false, after creating it once.To enable auto create also set hive.metastore.schema.verification=false. Auto creation is not recommended for production use cases, run schematool command instead.

property.name: hive.metastore.schema.verification
property.description: Enforce metastore schema version consistency. True: Verify that version information stored in is compatible with one from Hive jars. Also disable automatic schema migration attempt. Users are required to manually migrate schema after Hive upgrade which ensures proper metastore schema migration. (Default) False: Warn if the version information stored in metastore doesn't match with one from in Hive jars.

property.name: hive.metastore.schema.verification.record.version
property.description: When true the current MS version is recorded in the VERSION table. If this is disabled and verification is enabled the MS will be unusable.

property.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
property.description: hdfs location of default database for the warehouse

property.name: hive.metastore.db.type
property.description: Expects one of [derby, oracle, mysql, mssql, postgres]. Type of database used by the metastore. Information schema & JDBCStorageHandler depend on it.

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionURL
property.description: JDBC connect string for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionDriverName
property.description: Driver class name for a JDBC metastore

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionUserName
property.description: Username to use against metastore database

property.name: javax.jdo.option.ConnectionPassword
property.description: Password to use against metastore database

property.name: hive.server2.enable.doAs
property.description: Setting this property to true will have HiveServer2 execute Hive operations as the user making the calls to it.

property.name: hive.metastore.event.db.notification.api.auth
property.description: Should metastore do authorization against database notification related APIs such as get_next_notification. If set to true, then only the superusers in proxy settings have the permission
